column1:
Watch this video (http://openstaxcollege.org/l/graymatter) to learn about the gray matter of the spinal cord that
receives input from fibers of the dorsal (posterior) root and sends information out through the fibers of the ventral
(anterior) root. As discussed in this video, these connections represent the interactions of the CNS with peripheral
structuresforbothsensoryandmotorfunctions.Thecervicalandlumbarspinalcordshaveenlargementsasaresultof
larger populations of neurons. What are these enlargements responsible for?
